weka.classifiers.collective.util

Class SimpleFlipper

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.collective.util.Flipper
      • weka.classifiers.collective.util.SimpleFlipper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, OptionHandler

    public class SimpleFlipper
extends Flipper
    label = (rnd < p0) ? 0 : 1

    Valid options are: 

     -D
  Turns on output of debugging information.
  (default is off)

      • flipLabel

        public double flipLabel(Classifier c,
                        Instances instances,
                        int from,
                        int count,
                        int index,
                        FlipHistory history)
        returns the (possibly) new class label
        Specified by:
        flipLabel in class Flipper
        Parameters:
        c - the Classifier to use for prediction
        instances - the instances to use for flipping
        from - the starting of flipping
        count - the number of instances to flip
        index - the index of the instance to flip
        history - the flipping history
        Returns:
        the (possibly) new class label
        See Also:
        Flipper.setRandom(Random)
